articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce has a lot of optimism about crypto, and hopes to not see hasty, reactionary regulations in the wake of FTX.
articles.title: SEC’s Hester Peirce Has Seen ‘No Real Movement’ on SEC Crypto Regulation Since She Joined in 2018

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "Nothing against QuickBooks. Very nice tool," Ray said. "It's not for a multibillion dollar company."
articles.title: FTX Did Its Invoicing, Expenses Over Slack and QuickBooks: New CEO John Ray

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Alongside charges from the Southern District of New York’s Attorney and the SEC, the CFTC is suing the FTX founder for additional violations.
articles.title: CFTC Suing Sam Bankman-Fried, FTX and Alameda for Violating Commodities Laws

articles.description: The disgraced crypto mogul was arrested in the Bahamas yesterday night.

articles.description: With the release of a mobile version, Ava Labs’ Core Wallet is taking an important step towards creating an interconnected Web3 experience.
articles.title: Avalanche’s Core Wallet Goes Mobile With Android Launch

articles.description: The ever-awake crypto Twitter erupted once the news of Sam Bankman-Fried being arrested in the Bahamas broke out.

articles.description: Following an executive vote, DAI holders who deposit their holdings into the “DAI Savings Rate” smart contract can rake in a fixed yield.
articles.title: DeFi’s Central Bank MakerDAO Relaunches 1% Fixed Yield for DAI Holders

articles.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum and the broader crypto market jumped after the latest CPI Report indicated that inflation is cooling.

articles.description: Following “recent events in the crypto market,” Canada’s securities regulator is clamping down hard on crypto firms.
articles.title: Canada to Prohibit Crypto Firms From Offering Leveraged Trading to Citizens

articles.description: One day after Bankman-Fried was arrested in the Bahamas, the SEC has officially charged him with defrauding FTX's equity investors.

articles.description: The FSB's proposed rules come as many jurisdictions, such as the UK and European Union, finally clarify their regulations around crypto.

articles.description: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried will not be able to testify before Congress as expected.

articles.description: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," according to a police statement.

articles.title: 'Grossly Inexperienced and Unsophisticated' Leadership Caused FTX Collapse, Says New CEO

articles.description: Despite a nationwide crackdown on cryptocurrency, Chinese criminal organizations are still using digital assets to skirt the law.

articles.title: U.S. Senator Says He Sees 'No Reason Why' Crypto Exists

articles.description: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried’s mismanagement, “decentralization theater,” Tezos’s reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum traded sideways all week, with the market offering only a few green shoots. Elsewhere, SBF looks set to testify on Tuesday.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat Again, Axie Infinity Sees Rare Jump

articles.description: SushiSwap's Head Chef is calling for drastic measures to keep the DeFi project's future alive and well.

articles.description: The class action suit alleges that MoonPay and Guy Oseary worked with Yuga Labs to covertly pay celebrities to boost the popular NFT project.

articles.description: In the event of a worst-case scenario, FalconX said it has “decades of runway,” meaning that it has enough capital on hand to continue operating.

articles.description: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.
articles.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit

articles.description: In almost identical statements—one to the NYT and another on Twitter—the former FTX CEO denies trying to make UST and USDT lose their pegs to the dollar.
articles.title: SBF Denies He Tried to Attack Tether, 'Hunted' Three Arrows’ Terra Positions

articles.description: Relitigating the past, Binance boss CZ and ex-FTX CEO SBF again trade barbs over a business deal gone bad.
articles.title: 'No One Won': Binance CEO CZ Again Clashes With Sam Bankman-Fried

articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year

articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award

articles.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award

articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year

articles.description: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.

The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year

articles.description: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award

articles.description: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year

articles.description: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year

articles.description: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.
articles.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.
articles.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch

articles.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.
articles.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
